ModMetaData.name: Don't Shave Your Head 1.2
ModMetaData.author: NoImageAvailable, Dark Inquisitor, gaberad, Naiyasfury
ModMetaData.description:
Allows showing of hair below helmets and other headgear without clipping.
Does this in 2 ways: if the hairstyle has a custom texture (from the list below) it will use that, otherwise, if there is no custom texture, it will choose a semi-random texture from the list below (if enabled, on by default). This way it should be compatible with other hairstyle mods even though they aren't explicitly 'supported'
Current hairstyles mods with custom textures(load mods before this one): - vanilla (default) hairstyles, - Rimsenal Hair Pack, - Spoons Hair Mod, - Nackblad Inc Rimhair (both old and new). - Vanilla Hair Expanded
